title: Mermaid Light Skin Tone
description: A mythical sea creature with the upper body of a huperson and the tail of a fish, depicted with light skin tone. It symbolizes fantasy, dreams, and the allure of the ocean.
apple_vendor_description: On Apple devices, the mermaid with light skin tone emoji embodies enchanting fantasy with a gentle, pearlescent sheen. Her tail, rendered with Apple's signature glossy 3D shading, shimmers in shades of teal and emerald, catching the light with soft, rounded edges.  Her expression is serene and inviting, conveying a sense of wonder and the allure of mythical realms, making her a captivating addition to any digital narrative on Apple devices.
